author: IANS
title: China plans urban utilities tunnels
text: Moneylife Â» China plans urban utilities tunnels 42958 China plans urban utilities tunnels 0 Comments, Be the first to comment + COMMENT IANS | 31/07/2015 05:55 PM | China is planning to establish by 2020 a network of urban tunnels to hold pipelines for public utilities ranging from electricity, gas and water to telecommunications. The nationwide project is likely to be written into China's 13th Five-Year Plan (2016-2020) for development, which is set to be discussed in October, said Lu Kehua, deputy minister of housing and urban-rural development, on Friday. Better urban underground infrastructure will stimulate investment, improve supply of public goods and drive urbanisation, Xinhua news agency reported. More in Moneylife
